review: Very easy to install, remote is very user friendly.
author: Denise Haynes

review: We have been using it since Christmas and are very pleased.  The setup was simple and we have been enjoying the movies and games.  I like the voice search, but I wished it would work on the other movie apps like Netflix not just the Amazon Prime.  Eventually I am going to be building my own home media center and this will make a great addition.
author: neteng

review: This unit has a bug that used most of my gigabits of data for this month.  NEEDS TO BE FIXED!
author: Doreen Callahan

review: The fire TV works well if your using it for Netflix or any other TV show/movie streaming device. (Because of this, I wouldn't trade my roku or Apple tv for the Amazon fire TV)  But I actually was most excited to play games on it. My problem is that this thing doesn't have any memory! I can install 1-2 games at most. So I ordered a memory stick (it has a slot for it in the back) and although the memory stick fits in it, it doesn't give me any memory. Very frustrated by this. Unless I'm doin something wrong. Can anyone help me?
author: Amanda

review: Quick and simple set up. The remote works well, but it does not recognize my voice. No big deal but it should work since it was an advertised feature. I was NOT able to find a game controller in a store. Again no big deal, but if you're gonna tout the gaming features you should ensure the availability of controllers in store not just online. It is very fast when browsing and connecting to a selection. Overall I would recommend this unit.
author: J.

review: I was pretty disappointed to find that there are not many good apps for the Fire TV, at least not yet. In addition, while I have HBOGo and ShowtimeAnytime on my Kindle Fire HD, when I added them to the Fire TV they did not list my service provider (Charter) so I can't use them. I am usually a pretty happy member of the Amazon family but without purchasing an Prime membership this toy is not worth it.
author: tracie

review: I was able to watch one half a movie, I stopped watching to continue on another day. Then last night I tried to continue watching it. And Amazon Fire TV would not open the choices on my tv. I had to finish watching the movie on my computer. I bought this to watch on my tv not my computer. Please fix this.
author: Nola Fagen
